name: 300 Lives
description:
Hi, im working on a 2D celeste/supermario platformer you will have 300 lives to beat the game you can find some lives in the levels. I made the tutorial section (without the lives) so if anyone got some free time to test it and give me some feedback i would really appreciate it. Is it hard? Boring? Repetitive? Bad controls? etc

Recommended to play with Gamepad

For people that have a bad internet connection and the game is lagging there is a download option with the EXE. Right now it only works with windows.
